layer using JSP HTML and CSS and JQuery Developed JSP custom tags for front end Written Java script code for Input Validation Extensively used Spring IOC for Dependency Injection Developed J2EE queries using Joins and Stored Procedures Used Hibernate for ObjectRelational Mapping and for database operations in Oracle database Developed Action classes and DAO classes to access the database
